4_configure_remote.action: Add remote origin if GitHub repo exists
steps: Check if remote repo exists: curl -I https://github.com/jcmrs/thinking-tools-framework 2>&1
If exists: git remote add origin https://github.com/jcmrs/thinking-tools-framework
If not exists: Report 'Remote repo does not exist yet. Local git initialized, remote pending.'
4_configure_remote.validation: git remote -v shows origin (if exists) OR message about pending remote

5_branch_strategy.action: Ensure main branch exists and is default
steps: git branch -M main (rename master to main if needed)
